info.author: Nico Schlömer
info.description:
specialpy
=========

Python tools for special mathematical functions.

|CircleCI| |codecov| |PyPi Version| |GitHub stars|

.. figure:: https://nschloe.github.io/specialpy/specialpy.png
   :alt: 

Associated Legendre polynomials
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Evaluate the entire associated Legendre tree up to a given level at
once.

.. code:: python

    import specialpy
    vals = specialpy.alp_tree(
        n, x,
        normalization='full',
        with_condon_shortley_phase=True
        )

Fully vectorized in ``x``, meaning that you can provide floats or
array-like structures.

Spherical harmonics
~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~

Evaluate the entire spherical harmonics tree up to a given level at
once.

.. code:: python

    import specialpy
    vals = specialpy.sph_tree(n, x)

Fully vectorized in ``x``, meaning that you can provide floats or
array-like structures.

Installation
~~~~~~~~~~~~

specialpy is `available from the Python Package
Index <https://pypi.python.org/pypi/specialpy/>`__, so with

::

    pip install -U specialpy

you can install/upgrade.

Testing
~~~~~~~

To run the tests, simply check out this repository and run

::

    pytest

Distribution
~~~~~~~~~~~~

To create a new release

1. bump the ``__version__`` number,

2. publish to PyPi and GitHub:

   ::

       $ make publish

License
~~~~~~~

specialpy is published under the `MIT
license <https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/MIT_License>`__.
